column1: Smoque BBQ////I am from Texas and I have to say
column2: this is GREAT BBQ. I cannot believe there is this hidden gem in Chicago
column3: amazing. I ordered the baby back ribs and the briskets
column5: one of the employees. I also had the mac and cheese
column7: both excellent. The cole slaw has a really lite vinaigrette dressing and it goes so well with everything since some things are quite heavy. The meats were absolutely moist and smokey and it's out of this world. I have no idea why anyone would complain about this restaurant. Also
column8: they may not tell you but you should ask for the pickled jalapenos
column10: especially if you put it with your mac and cheese
column11: weird combo but DELICIOUS. I have to say this will be a place to visit next time i'm in Chicago.
